message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm confident it's worth at least $1000000 to me, and I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm sure you won't find this opportunity elsewhere. Let me know your thoughts.
